resources.string: We can say that each of us have a higher self and a lower self and that these two are in constant battle with each other. The can vs The should.
Self discipline is giving everything you haveâ€¦ and knowing what to hold back.
When you are not practicing, refining, working, somewhere someone else is and when you will meet them, they will beat you.
We each have a twenty four hour day, which is more than enough time to do what we must do.
The more stressful the situation, the more discipline sleep requires.
We say "I am not a morning person" but that is almost certainly because we have been an irresponsible or undisciplined evening person
We will taste pain in this journey, and that is a fact.
No one who is a slave to their urges or sloth, no one without strength or a good schedule, can create a great life.
Greatness is not just what one does, but also what one refuses to do
